greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest k such that A014657(n) divides 2^k + 1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: k x = elemIndex 0 $ map (`mod` x) $ take (fromInteger x) a000051_list
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 21 2011
